description:
testing: document whitespace trimming of example expected/actual output.

Fixes issue 4642.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: adg@golang.org),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

https://codereview.appspot.com/7090044/diff/3002/src/pkg/testing/testing.go
File src/pkg/testing/testing.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/7090044/diff/3002/src/pkg/testing/testing.go#newcode45
src/pkg/testing/testing.go:45: // the standard output of the function when the tests are run. Leading and trailing
Perhaps just add this parenthetical:

(The comparison ignores leading and trailing space.)

PTAL

https://codereview.appspot.com/7090044/diff/3002/src/pkg/testing/testing.go
File src/pkg/testing/testing.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/7090044/diff/3002/src/pkg/testing/testing.go#newcode45
src/pkg/testing/testing.go:45: // the standard output of the function when the tests are run. Leading and trailing
Ah, much more concise.

On 2013/01/11 11:46:37, adg wrote:
> Perhaps just add this parenthetical:
> 
> (The comparison ignores leading and trailing space.)

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=e018b45f9a6e ***

      testing: document whitespace trimming of example expected/actual output.

Fixes issue 4642.

R=golang-dev, adg
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7090044

Committer: Andrew Gerrand <adg@golang.org>

https://codereview.appspot.com/7090044/diff/10001/src/pkg/testing/testing.go
File src/pkg/testing/testing.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/7090044/diff/10001/src/pkg/testing/testing.go#newcode45
src/pkg/testing/testing.go:45: // the standard output of the function when the tests are run (ignoring leading
I know I'm being picky, but I think it's hard to grok what the ignoring is about. I think the parenthetical should be a separate sentence. It's always better to use small, distinct, unambiguous sentences.

PTAL

https://codereview.appspot.com/7090044/diff/10001/src/pkg/testing/testing.go
File src/pkg/testing/testing.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/7090044/diff/10001/src/pkg/testing/testing.go#newcode45
src/pkg/testing/testing.go:45: // the standard output of the function when the tests are run (ignoring leading
That's fair.

On 2013/01/12 00:01:37, adg wrote:
> I know I'm being picky, but I think it's hard to grok what the ignoring is
> about. I think the parenthetical should be a separate sentence. It's always
> better to use small, distinct, unambiguous sentences.
